abstract: Christine Macel, the chief curator of the Pompidou Center, will be the visual arts director of the 2017 Venice Biennale.

headline.main: Christine Macel Named Visual Arts Director for Venice Biennale
headline.print_headline: Venice Biennale Chooses Visual Arts Director

snippet: Christine Macel, the chief curator of the Pompidou Center, will be the visual arts director of the 2017 Venice Biennale.
